name: Modelo
description: Modelo Especial is a light, crisp, pilsner-style beer. But its younger sibling, Negra Modelo, is modeled after the super-popular Munich-born dunkel style, made with roasted caramel malts and brewed longer for a slightly richer, dark-brass-colored beer

name: Yuengling
description: Established in 1829, D.G. Yuengling & Son, Inc. is America’s Oldest Brewery. Based on Pottsville, PA, Yuengling is a 6th-generation family-owned and operated business built on strong heritage and tradition. Principal beer brands include Traditional Lager, Light Lager, Black and Tan, Premium, Light, Dark Brewed Porter, Lord Chesterfield Ale and three great seasonals: IPL, Summer Wheat and Oktoberfest.

name: Efes
description: Anadolu Efes is a Turkish beverage producer known, among other things, for its Efes Pilsen beer. In Turkey, Efes Pilsen is the beer with the highest production volume - but the brand has also established itself as a permanent fixture in over 70 other countries. Efes Pilsener has been produced by Einbecker Brauhaus since 2010. In taste, the beer is malty and slightly spicy with a long finish.

name: Brand
description: Proud winner of the Dutch Beer Challenge 2020, where Brand Pilsener was proclaimed the tastiest lager in the Netherlands. Great quality for every lover of lager, brewed according to an ancient recipe and with an eye for the beauty of the good life. Powerful taste, soft in the aftertaste, beautiful color and wonderfully refreshing. With a snack or just because you can. The good life in every sip.

name: Guinness
description:
Guinness is the epitome of Irish beer - the brewery is inextricably linked with Irish history. Founded in Dublin in 1759, at first no one believed that stout, the beer brewed from roasted malt, would triumph. But Arthur Guinness proved the critics wrong, and today the dark ruby-colored beer is one of the most famous in the world. Guinness Draught has a lush, fine-pored foam and a malty flavor with distinct notes of licorice.

Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)

comments.author: Michel
comments.content: Don't like coffee, neither this beer...

name: Kill kenny
description: A malted beer, quite round in the mouth, with a light lasting bitterness. A trail of caramelised barley makes it a full-bodied beer as it has a low sugar content. A light and fruity creamy texture. Quite refreshing.

name: Cardinal blonde
description: Cardinal Blonde is always there when good friends meet and enjoy carefree moments. Since 1788, the traditional beer has captivated with its pure lager taste and incomparable freshness. The modern filtration technology makes the delicate yellow and finely tuned Cardinal Blonde an experience for the palate.

name: Cardinal blanche
description: Similar to what you would expect from Belgian Witbiers, our Cardinal Blanche surprises with fine aromatic clove notes. The light finish has a mild bitterness and is accompanied by a refreshing acidity.

comments.author: Michel
